Unnamed: 9: COPD is a serious condition that can make it difficult for you to breathe. It's important to take steps to manage your condition and avoid triggers that can make your symptoms worse. There is no cure for COPD, but with treatment and lifestyle changes, you can slow the progression of the disease and improve your quality of life.
